```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
setwd("C:/Anna/latent_attraction/AE_paper/OSF")
rm(list=ls())
library(data.table)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(readr)

load("List_of_stimuli.RData")


stimuli <- quadruplets_for_subs[, c("Target_A_Title", "Decoy_A_Title", "Target_B_Title", "Decoy_B_Title")]
stimuli[, No := 1:.N]
stimuli <- setcolorder(stimuli, c("No", "Target_A_Title", "Decoy_A_Title", "Target_B_Title", "Decoy_B_Title"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
kable_out <- stimuli %>%
  kable(booktabs = T,  longtable = T, col.names = c("", "Target A", "Decoy A",
                                                    "Target B", "Decoy B"),
        caption = "List of stimuli used in the experiment", "latex") %>%
 kable_styling(full_width = T, latex_options = "repeat_header")%>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, width = "1cm") #%>%
  #row_spec(seq(20,nrow(stimuli), by = 20), hline_after = T)
write_file(kable_out, "kable_out.tex")

```
